about_the_game:
Play 3 of the most popular card games with smart & powerful AI co-players, who won’t forget the game’s rules:

  • French Belote – the original: a trick-taking game played by four players in two teams, using a 32-card deck, and featuring Ace-Ten cards.

  • Contrée – a variant of Belote with advanced bidding options.

  • Coinche – a variant of Belote with even further advanced bidding options, declarations, and No Trumps & All Trump modes.

*** HIGHLIGHTS ***

  • Powerful AI partner & opponents – choose a skill level: beginner, intermediate, or expert & accept the challenge.

  • Smart, interactive gameplay hints at your fingertips: not sure which card to play? Our strong built-in AI help will assist you in making the right choice. You'll become a Belote pro in no time!

  • Customize your experience with French & International card sets, multiple card backs, table backgrounds, and ten soothing soundtracks

  • Detailed integrated rules included.

  • Powerful statistics will help you track & improve your results.

  • Experience crisp HD graphics and beautiful animations.

  • Play in Fullscreen or Window mode, Portrait or Landscape – Belote 3in1 will auto adapt to (nearly) any screen size and aspect ratio.

*** HIGHLY CONFIGURABLE GAMEPLAY ***

All the original rules & wide range of advanced options:

  • Play with or without No Trumps / All Trumps

  • Play with or without Belote and Rebelote in All Trumps

  • Freely choose your preferred points-per-game goal for quick or longer gameplay sessions

  • Obligation or not to "piss" Trump

  • Obligation or not to ''force'' Trump

  • Obligation or not to pass on Jack

  • Vache game mode

  • Belote counts for the success or failure of a contract

  • Hanging points at deuce

  • Double points for No Trumps / All Trumps

  • 130 points at No Trumps

  • 258 points at All Trumps

  • Automatic play (when there is only one card to play)

  • Show or hide the table score

  • Pro feature: speed up your gameplay by supercharging animations & disabling card-dealing animations

  • Optimized card sorting for left-handed & right-handed players

  • Play with or without Generale contract (Coinche & Contree)

  • Allow the ability to Surcoinche/Redouble (Coinche & Contree)

  • Bid on Capot contract

  • And many more…
